title: Hot Springs National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities. NPS Centennial Find out how we are helping the National Park Service celebrate 100 years! National Parks BioBlitz Join National Geographic and the National Park Service in Hot Springs, Arkansas for the National Parks BioBlitz and Biodiversity Festival, May 20-21, 2016 Partners Here are list of our local partners and resources. Volunteer Be sure to visit our park and see how you can get involved!
